桐.definition: tree name (variously Paulownia, Firmiana or Aleurites)

桐人.definition: puppet burial object; wooden effigy buried to put a curse on sb

桐城.definition: Tongcheng, a county-level city in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1qing4], Anhui

桐城市.definition: Tongcheng, a county-level city in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1qing4], Anhui

桐廬.definition: Tonglu county in Hangzhou 杭州[Hang2 zhou1], Zhejiang

桐廬縣.definition: Tonglu county in Hangzhou 杭州[Hang2 zhou1], Zhejiang

桐木偶.definition: puppet burial object; wooden effigy buried to put a curse on sb

桐柏.definition: Tongbai county in Nanyang 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan

桐柏山.definition: Tongbai mountain range, the watershed between Huai 淮河 and Han 漢江|汉江 rivers

桐柏縣.definition: Tongbai county in Nanyang 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan

桐梓.definition: Taongzi county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

桐梓縣.definition: Taongzi county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

桐油.definition: tung oil, from the Japanese wood-oil tree Aleurites cordata, used in making lacquer

桐鄉.definition: Tongxiang, county-level city in Jiaxing 嘉興|嘉兴[Jia1 xing1], Zhejiang

桐鄉市.definition: Tongxiang, county-level city in Jiaxing 嘉興|嘉兴[Jia1 xing1], Zhejiang
